title: My Internet keeps on disconnecting while I'm playing League??
body: pretty much all i run is overwolf, spotify and league while i'm playing . I have fiber Optic i'm getting 100 up and down. could anybody help? thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Well it sounds like your internet speeds should be all fine, so there might be something blocking or hampering your connection after it leaves your network. Let's check for any packet loss really quickly to know if I can rule that possibility out.

Grab your network logs from a game that disconnected, and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. Take a screenshot and post it here so I can see what that connection looks like!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kJ3H49WK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-24T20:31:41.330+0000)
>
> Well it sounds like your internet speeds should be all fine, so there might be something blocking or hampering your connection after it leaves your network. Let's check for any packet loss really quickly to know if I can rule that possibility out.
> 
> Grab your network logs from a game that disconnected, and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. Take a screenshot and post it here so I can see what that connection looks like!

http://imgur.com/QaXh96z
this link above is the one where i played against naut and just d/c out of no where. i lost that game. and the one bleow this i cant remember which game it was but i know i was d/c constantly in rank ques. it was frustrating.
http://imgur.com/a/jJdOU

Ahhhh yea it looks like your network was fighting with a bit of packet loss. It might be happening if your ISP is sending your connection through a damaged node possibly, but let's get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they can help. Have those network logs handy so they can take a look through them!
